column4: uhm, i'm on Hardy, not using network manager but simply /etc/network/interface, with a card that gets identified as RT2500 (and driven by the wlan0 + wmaster0 combo0). i'm trying to make it connect to an ad-hoc network, but it'll refuse to set mode from interface. clues why?
actually, by the bot about 0 seconds later :P
my brain had already given the command to hit Enter by then :P
also, did it always resolve to a swedish host? :o
The Swedes wanted to benchmark their new 10Gbps network though.
But America waking up was a bit too much.
do you think that was intentional?
i can confirm Rebecca_HOt spams on join
